value:
I know they aren't the same Princess
Minerva and Prince Michalis, yet I'm
still nervous around them...

I went all the way from Macedon to
Valentia, looking for Est... Looking
back, it was quite the journey.

Please don't hesitate to bring me
your troubles. I am the eldest of us
three, after all. I'm a good listener!

I'm about to make my rounds of the
castle. Why don't you come along?
We can keep each other company.

Est! Hey, Est! That's not my Est, you
say, but an Est from another world?
Just how many are there?

I was sent by a friend of yours to
check up on how you're faring.
Oh, it was $Nf!

I still have a way to go, but this
is clear progress, and for that I
am thankful.

Let's look on the bright side...
I have more room for growth!

This just won't do. You have
my apologies.

As the eldest Whitewing I will do
my utmost to ensure that I live up
to your expectations.

I am Palla. I belong to the Macedonian
Whitewings, but I traveled to Valentia
for, let's say, personal reasons.

Perfect timing! I've been wanting to
have a little chat with you for some
time.$k$pIt's just that... Well, this place is so
different from my world, and I'm
having a little trouble taking it all in.$k$pIt's hard not to feel overwhelmed, but
at the same time, I know I have to set
a good example for my sisters.$k$p"Just take it a day at a time," hmm?
That's very kind of you to say,
$Nu.$k$pSomehow I feel more myself when
I'm with you. I hope I'll continue
to have your ear in the future.
たあっ
決める！
ああっ…
いけない…
Leave this to me.
You'll go no further!
You'll understand soon enough!
Not a chance!
I've failed you, Est...
うふふ…
I'm Palla. I've come from Archanea in search of my sister.
What? Please...pester someone else.
My youngest sister, Est, was kidnapped by pirates. I hope she's safe.
The people of Valentia were unfailingly kind to us.
I keep running into different versions of my sisters here in Askr! I can hardly believe my eyes.
Oh, Abel... No, I mustn't. These feelings are for me and for me alone.
You're a mysterious one, aren't you? When I'm at your side, I somehow feel that everything will turn out all right.
I'll handle it.
I wonder...
It's already done.
